Simulation

Class AbstractMax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      • Simulation.AbstractMax
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fluid, Particles

    public abstract class AbstractMax
extends com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
    AbstractMax is a MaxObject's abstraction that provide basic stuffs and blobs system for it's children. Please note that AbstractMax is an abstract class and each children will be an instantiable Max Object.

      • applyBlob

        protected abstract void applyBlob(int index,
             float posX,
             float posY)
        Define whatever to do when a blob occurs. Abstract : Must be overrode
        Parameters:
        index - Blob's index
        posX - X Position on which blob occurs
        posY - Y Position on which blob occurs

      • computeCoefs

        public static float[] computeCoefs(float minFrom,
                   float maxFrom,
                   float minTo,
                   float maxTo)
        Computes A and B coefficients for a 1D linear scale (Y = A * X + B)
        Parameters:
        minFrom - Lower bound of original interval
        maxFrom - Higher bound of original interval
        minTo - Lower bound of destination interval
        maxTo - Higher bound of destination interval
        Returns:
        A and B coefficients
